original_title: Hunt vs Lauda: The Next Generation
overview: A generation ago, the world was captivated as motorsportâ€™s biggest rivalry was born between two legends, Niki Lauda and James Hunt. Now, the story is continued by their sons, Freddie and Mathias, who prepare for a thrilling showdown on the iconic Donington circuit.
tagline: Two sons of legends, one enduring rivalry.
title: Hunt vs Lauda: The Next Generation
